mapper.select:
select tda.id, trade_id, mall_id, sales_date, sales_amount, sales_volume, sales_count, is_holiday, holiday_id, date_type, dayofweek, week_num, weather, customer_volume, car_volume,tt.trade_name from e_trade_daily_achievement tda,e_trade_type tt where tda.trade_id=tt.id and TO_DAYS( now() ) - TO_DAYS(tda.sales_date) = 1 and tda.is_alive =1 and
trade_id=11
trade_id!=11
order by sales_amount desc
select sum(sales_amount) from e_trade_daily_achievement tda,e_trade_type tt where tda.trade_id=tt.id and TO_DAYS( now() ) - TO_DAYS(tda.sales_date) = 1 and tda.is_alive =1 and trade_id!=11

select tda.id, trade_id, mall_id, sales_date, sales_amount, sales_volume, sales_count, is_holiday, holiday_id, date_type, dayofweek, week_num, weather, customer_volume, car_volume,tt.trade_name from e_trade_daily_achievement tda,e_trade_type tt where tda.trade_id=tt.id and trade_id=#{tradeId} and sales_date between #{fromDate} and #{toDate} and tda.is_alive =1
select sum(sales_amount) from e_trade_daily_achievement tda,e_trade_type tt where tda.trade_id=tt.id and trade_id=#{tradeId} and sales_date between #{fromDate} and #{toDate} and tda.is_alive =1
